Crit Effect

Crushed Intestines Normal damage. The target is wounded 2 and enfeebled 2 until it is no longer wounded.

Lodged in the Bone The target takes 1d6 persistent bleed damage.

Severed Spine The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be paralyzed until healed.

Psychic Overflow The target takes 1d8 mental damage.
